Author: bigglob
Text: Andrew Solomon has a few really great TED talk about depression and stuff + amazing soothing voice and a++ eloquence: https://youtu.be/-eBUcBfkVCo  https://youtu.be/RiM5a-vaNkg  He helps calm and ground me a bit when I’m sad. I hope it helps + if you need anyone to talk to I’m glad to answer! Take care and be kind to yourself!

Author: ziyal79
Text: Okay, I've got something that really helps me when I'm struggling, I find this guy's voice very calming: https://youtu.be/ND7BLzOVjWg  Your pain is valid, I hear you. It is enough. You don't need to keep hurting yourself. No one deserves pain, not even you.
